data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: One of the first things new shooters want to know is if a gun will kick them. New ____ learn ____ hold ____ gun ____ to ____ and ____ recoil. If ____ a ____, ____ both ____. In other words, no matter how well you hold the weapon, recoil anticipation can ruin every shot.
data.partBlankContent: One of the first things new shooters want to know is if a gun will kick them. New shoo____ learn t_ hold t__ gun fir___ to red___ and con____ recoil. If fir___ a han____, u__ both ha___. In other words, no matter how well you hold the weapon, recoil anticipation can ruin every shot.
data.fullContent: One of the first things new shooters want to know is if a gun will kick them. New shooters learn to hold the gun firmly to reduce and control recoil. If firing a handgun, use both hands. In other words, no matter how well you hold the weapon, recoil anticipation can ruin every shot.
data.answer: 新手想要知道的第一件事是枪是否会反冲他们。新射手要学会紧紧握枪以减少和控制后坐力。如果用手枪射击，请用双手。换句话说，不管你拿着武器有多好，对后坐力的预期会破坏每一次射击。
